content: Dr. Cindy LI, CSE, HKUST Cindy Xin LI PhD, Hong Kong Univ. of Sci. & Tech., 2005 Assistant Professor of Engineering Education Undergraduate Programs Coordinator Dept. of Computer Science and Engineering Hong Kong University of Science & Technology Email: lixin@cse.ust.hk Tel: (+852) 2358 6994 Office: Room 3525, Academic Building EXPAND ALL SECTIONS COLLAPSE ALL SECTIONS Introduction Cindy Xin LI is the assistant professor of Engineering Education at Department of Computer Science and Engineering at the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology. She received her Ph.D from the same department, with research interests on network algorithms (especially in switches and routers). She focuses in undergraduate education, administration, counseling and advising now. She teaches fundamental courses in Computer Science, overlooks department undergraduate issues, leads advising and counseling service, and actively invovles in educatioin innovation. She is the founding member of Center for Engineering Education Innovation.
